001package com.fns.grivet.config;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.Module;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsonorg.JsonOrgModule;
005
006import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
007import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
008
009@Configuration
010public class JsonConfig {
011
012    @Bean
013    public Module orgJsonModule() {
014        return new JsonOrgModule();
015    }
016}
